info.title: Customer Returns Delivery (A2X)
info.description: This service enables you to create, read, update and delete customer returns deliveries. It can be consumed in Fiori apps and on other user interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Process customer returns deliveries using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Delivery Processing without Order Reference(1MI)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1MI " Link To BP ")
[Direct Procurement with Inbound Delivery(2TX)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2TX " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Shipping: Delivery (LE_SHP_DELIVERY)
* Shipping: Delivery Item (LE_SHP_DELIVERYITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_ReturnsDeliveryAddress HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
